definition: by brute strength/rashly and forcefully/bull-headed/to work tenaciously with no fear of hardship
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: We must be bold in "hard money" and not to doubt their own.
sentences.chinese: 要敢於“硬幹”，不要懷疑自己。

definition: to look favorably on sth/would be glad to see it happen
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to charge and break through enemy lines
to repeat errors/to continue blundering/to make continuous mistakes
to act arbitrarily/to make decisions without consulting others
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
